sen.j: 石田幸雄（いしだ ゆきお、1949年8月3日 -）は狂言方和泉流野村万作家の狂言師。
sen.e: Yukio ISHIDA (August 3, 1949 -) is a Kyogen performer of Izumi-ryu school for Kyogen-kata, belonging to the Mansaku NOMURA family.
Yukio ISHIDA (August 3, 1949 -) is a Kyogen performer of Izumi school for Kyogen-kata, belonging to the Mansaku NOMURA family.
Yukio ISHIDA (August 3, 1949 -) is a Kyogen performer of Izumi school for Kyogen-kata, belonging to the Mansaku NOMURA family.
He was born in Tokyo
He was born in Tokyo.
sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。
sen.e: He was born in Tokyo.

sen.j: 高校在学中より野村万作に師事。
sen.e: While he was still a high school student, he learned under Mansaku NOMURA.
While he was still a high school student, he learned under Mansaku NOMURA.
While he was still a high school student, he learned under Mansaku NOMURA.

sen.j: 重要無形文化財総合指定者。
sen.e: He was designated as the general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
He was designated as the general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
He was designated as the general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 「万作の会」の重要な演者の一人。
sen.e: He is one of the important performers in the kyogen performance group 'Mansaku no kai' lead by Mansaku NOMURA.
He is one of the important performers in the kyogen performance group 'Mansaku no kai' lead by Mansaku NOMURA.
He is one of the important performers in the kyogen performance group 'Mansaku no kai' lead by Mansaku NOMURA.

sen.j: 大胆且つ緻密な演技で、既に数多くの優れた舞台歴を持つ。
sen.e: His performance is bold and precise, and has already performed on a lot of distinguished stages.
His performance is bold and precise, and has already performed on a lot of distinguished stages.
His performance is bold and precise, and has already performed on a lot of distinguished stages.

sen.j: 2001年に宝生流田崎隆三とともに「雙ノ会」を設立。
sen.e: In 2001, he set up a group of Noh and Kyogen players "So no kai" with Ryuzo TAZAKI of Hosho-ryu school.
sen.cmt: 「雙ノ会」→ a group of Noh and Kyogen players "So no kai" としました。
sen.e: In 2001, he set up a group of Noh and Kyogen players 'So no kai' with Ryuzo TAZAKI of Hosho school.
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。ryu削除しました。
sen.e: In 2001, he set up a group of Noh and Kyogen players 'So no kai' with Ryuzo TAZAKI of Hosho school.

sen.j: 日本大学芸術学部・学習院大学非常勤講師
sen.e: He was adjunct instructor to College of Art of Nihon University and Gakushuin University.
He was adjunct instructor to College of Art of Nihon University and Gakushuin University.
He was adjunct instructor to College of Art of Nihon University and Gakushuin University.
In 1976, he made a debut in 'Kusabira' (mushrooms).
